Name: AQtion
About the game: The classic game is back in AQTION ! Play like you're the hero in an action movie in this fast-paced multiplayer FPS that spawned one of the most popular and influential games of all time, Counter-Strike. Realistic, locational damage and weapons are at your disposal, across over 600 community-made maps, dozens of player skins and models to choose from, in deathmatch, team deathmatch, capture the flag, three team and many more modes to play!
